name.ja: <ruby>道化の一座<rt>クラウン・クラン</rt></ruby>『下稽古』

text.en: Tribute 1 monster from your hand or field; add 1 "Clown Clan Whiteface" and 1 "Clown Clan" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Clown Clan "Rehearsal"". You can banish this card from your GY; Ritual Summon 1 "Clown Clan" Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal or exceed its Level. You can only use each effect of "Clown Clan "Rehearsal"" once per turn.
